title: Tassel, 18th century
medium: Medium: silk, metal thread, wooden core
description: Skirt of colored silks and metal threads with pink, white, blue, green and yellow tassels. Collar of fringed silk and looped metal threads. Head is vase-shaped with a covering of gilt, yellow, white and blue spiral stripes on a pink ground. Cord of red and green knotted silk threads.

tombstone.epitaph: Tassel, 18th century. Medium: silk, metal thread, wooden core. 1908-2-23.
